text: I mean are some people who say that you
shouldn't even look at effectiveness at

whether using game theory or not and I

affected but we don't you don't use it

because in a survey i did in 2011
two-thirds of the people who say if it's

maybe the some people don't like the

and I'm not going to call the moral

nothing unpatriotic about changing your
